meanings.sent1: The hardworking earner saved up to buy a new bicycle.
meanings.sent2: My dad is the main earner in our family.
meanings.sent3: The little earner squirrel worked hard to collect nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: The earner bee diligently gathered nectar for the hive.
meanings.sent5: The young earner eagerly mowed lawns to make some extra cash.

meanings.definition: something that earns, as money or interest
meanings.sent1: The investment turned out to be a good earner for the company.
meanings.sent2: The rental property proved to be a reliable earner for the landlord.
meanings.sent3: The lucky penny became a surprising earner when sold at an auction.
meanings.sent4: The antique vase was a silent earner at the garage sale.
meanings.sent5: The lemonade stand was a popular earner at the school fair.
